entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
